name: Renamed Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet (Legacy)
summary: An _XLS file is a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet that has had its extension changed from .XLS to ._xls . A user or program may have changed the file's extension on purpose or by accident. _XLS files can be opened in Microsoft Excel and other spreadsheet programs after you rename them to use the .xls extension.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file

macos.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file

linux.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file

web.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file

ios.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file

android.display_name: Must be renamed to .xls then opened as an XLS file
